news.title: 'Magnificent Seven' stocks: Buy Nvidia, skip Apple
news.summary: The "Magnificent Seven," Nvidia (NVDA), Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL), Tesla (TSLA), Microsoft (MSFT), Amazon (AMZN), Meta (META), and Apple (AAPL), have dominated the markets over the last couple of years. But which one should you buy? In the latest Good Buy or Goodbye, GraniteShares Founder & CEO Will Rhind says Nvidia should be added to your portfolio, while Apple is one to skip, for now. news.title: Microsoft earnings top estimates on cloud strength
news.summary: Microsoft reported fiscal fourth quarter results that topped Wall Street estimates. Adjusted earnings were $3.65 per share compared to a Bloomberg consensus estimate of $3.37. Revenue was $76.44 billion, topping the expected $73.89 billion. The company got a boost from the strong performance from its Intelligent Cloud unit. news.title: Meta stock jumps on Q2 earnings beat, upbeat Q3 revenue guide
news.summary: Meta Platforms (META) reported second quarter results that topped Wall Street estimates on both the top and bottom lines. Earnings of $7.14 per share topped the Bloomberg consensus estimate of $5.89. Revenue was $47.52 billion compared to the estimate of $44.83 billion. The tech giant's outlook for Q3 revenue was also better than analysts had been expecting. news.title: LG & Tesla, Hershey trims outlook, Peloton upgraded
news.summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. LG (373220.KS) reportedly signed a $4.3 billion battery supply deal with Tesla (TSLA), according to Reuters.  Hershey (HSY) beat earnings expectations thanks to strong Easter candy sales, but lowered its full-year outlook due to tariff costs. Peloton (PTON) stock jumps after UBS upgraded the stock to Buy from Neutral, citing subscription price hikes and signs of stabilizing subscriber trends. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

news.title: No tariff pause announced after US-China talks, with Trump set to make the 'final call'
news.summary: US and Chinese negotiators wrapped up two days of talks Tuesday without an immediate announcement of a further tariff delay between the world’s two largest economies, but US officials said that still remains an option for President Trump.

news.title: Comcast Earnings Are Nearly Here. This Number Is Key.
news.summary: Comcast  stock is on a bad run, but second-quarter earnings on Thursday could spark a much-needed turnaround.  Analysts expect NBCUniversal’s parent to report an adjusted profit of $1.16 a share on revenue of $29.8 billion, according to FactSet.  Last quarter, Comcast opened its Universal Epic Universe theme park in Orlando, Florida, but broadband subscriptions probably will be the focus for investors when the company reports its numbers.
